Name: Undead Menace
About the game: Undead Menace As you embark on a new adventure, you could hardly imagine that treasure hunt in ancient caves could turn into a survival game! The local undead are very much against the fact that you decided to enrich yourself at their expense and rose from the graves, trying to hit you with deadly magic! But will that stop you? Overcome obstacles on your way to the coveted gold, dodge enemies and deadly traps. Will you be able to overcome all the deadly levels and get to the very end? Undead Menace is a 2D platformer, going after the positive character Teonu, overcome terrible and rattling caves on your way, filled with many monsters of the past Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack By QUE Sounds
